name: Lost Memories: Midnight
description:
Lost Memories : Midnight

Is a Short 2D-Platformer Atmospheric-Horror Game

As The Main Character, You'll Have To Kill The Enemies, Pass The Levels And Uncover THE LOST MEMORIES.

Controls :

W/D && Arrow Keys to walk

Space to Jump And Double Jump

Mouse-Left to Attack

Esc to return to the main menu

Created By :

Alireza Latifi && Emad Mohebi
